name: Tecalis
description: Tecalis is a company composed of young and enterprising people. In view of what is handled in the market their main job is to do things of quality and professionalism. Everything that develops is based on recent technologies. They document every day to give the best service and quality to the customer. They have engineers and people in experts in custom software development, creation of business development modules, static and dynamic web development etc.
